original_text: And against the wall of the house he built chambers round about, against the walls of the house round about, both of the temple and of the oracle: and he made chambers round about:
korean_text: 또 성전의 벽 곧 성소와 지성소의 벽에 연접하여 돌아가며 다락들을 건축하되 다락마다 돌아가며 골방들을 만들었으니

sentences.original_text: And against the wall of the house
against the walls of the house round about
both of the temple and of the oracle
and he made chambers round about
